seo.title: Vackra promenader i och runt Positano
seo.description: Promenader och kortare vandringar med utsikt, tider och svårighetsgrad.

linkLabel: Vackra promenader i och runt Positano
intro: Link terrace lanes and viewpoints for short scenic loops without turning the day into a full hike.

sections.title: Upper-village loop
body: Connect Chiesa Nuova and Sponda via terrace lanes for classic skyline views with lighter foot traffic.

sections.title: Fornillo coastal path
body: Follow the quieter beach approach and photogenic staircases. Aim for early morning or golden hour.

sections.title: Nocelle viewpoint stroll
body: Ride the bus up to Nocelle and branch off short spurs for sweeping vistas without long stair descents.

a: Choose supportive trainers with grip; some paths include uneven stone steps and can be slick after rain.
Each loop takes 30–60 minutes including photo stops. Add bus rides for Nocelle to keep gradients manageable.
